data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Change in Management
data.news_body: Re-appointment of Mr. Rasesh Kanakia (DIN: 00015857) as Executive Chairman and Mr. Himanshu Kanakia (DIN: 00015908) as Managing Director of the Company to hold office for a period of 5  years commencing from 01 May 2026 and end on 30 April 2031 effective from expiry of their present term ending on 30 April 2026.

data.caption: Closure of Trading Window
data.news_body:
Dear Sir
We wish to inform you that in terms of notification dated 02nd April 2019 towards clarification regarding trading restriction period under SEBI(PIT) Regulation 2015 the trading window for dealing in securities of the company shall remain closed with effect from 1st October 2025 till 48 hours after declaration of unaudited financial results for the quarter ended 30th September 2025 in terms of the code of conduct of the company under SEBI (PIT) Regulation 2015. This is for your information and record.

data.caption: Intimation Under Regulation 30 Read With Schedule III Of SEBI (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 (SEBI Listing Regulations) - Letter To Members Not Having Email Ids Registered For Accessing The Annual Report For The FY 2024
data.news_body:
In compliance with Regulation 36(1)(b) of the  SEBI (LODR) Regulation  2015 a letter is being sent to those members whose e-mail ids are not registered with the Company/ MUFG Intime India Private Limited - Registrar and Share Transfer Agent/ Depository Participants providing the web-link and QR code where Annual Report for the financial year- 2024-25 and the Notice of the 23rd Annual General Meeting can be accessed on the Companys website.

The letter in this regard has been enclosed herewith as Annexure I.

The Intimation is also being uploaded on the companys website at https://www.moviemax.co.in/investors
 
Kindly take note of the above on your record

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Newspaper Publication
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 30 read with Regulation of SEBI (LODR) Regulation 2015 please find attached herewith copies of newspaper advertisements published in the Business Standard (English Language) and Navshakti (Marathi Language) on August 27 2025.

Kindly take the intimation on record.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Newspaper Publication
data.news_body:
Pursuant Regulation 30 of SEBI (LODR) Regulation 2015 please find attached herewith copies of newspaper advertisements published in the Business Standard (English Language) and Navshakti (Marathi Language) regarding 23rd AGM of the company and e-voting information for the same.

Kindly take the intimation on record.

data.caption: Notice Of Twenty-Third Annual General Meeting To Be Held On Friday 26Th  September 2025 At 11:00 AM Through OAVM
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 30 of SEBI (LODR) Regulation 2015 please find attached herewith notice of 23rd AGM of the Company to be held on Friday 26th September 2025 at 11:00 AM through OAVM.
This is for your information and records.

data.caption: Reg. 34 (1) Annual Report.
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 34(1) and Regulation 30 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 please find attached the Annual Report of the Company for the Financial Year 2024-2025 along with the Notice of 23rd Annual General Meeting of the Members of the Company.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Diversification / Disinvestment
data.news_body: Intimation for sale of wholly owned subsidiary Transquare Realty Private Limited.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Change in Management
data.news_body:
Dear Sir 

The Board of Directors in their Meeting held on 30th July 2025 inter alia considered and approved the following:
1. Re-appointment of Mr. Rasesh Kanakia as the Executive Chairman of the Company for a further period  of Five years
2. Re-appointment of Mr. Himanshu Kanakia as the Executive MD for a further period of five years
3. Approval for revision in salary of Mr. Ashish Kanakia to office or place of profit in senior management grade. 
All the above is subject to approval of the members at the ensuing Annual General meeting. 
Kindly take the same on records and oblige.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting Pursuant To Regulation 30 And 33 Of The Securities And Exchange Board Of India (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 As Amended (SEBI LODR).
data.news_body:
This is to inform you that the Board of the Directors (Board) of Cineline India Limited (Company) at their meeting held today viz. Tuesday July 30 2025 inter alia considered and approved the Unaudited Standalone Financial Results of the Company for the quarter ended 30th June 2025 as recommended by the Audit Committee of the Board of Director of the Company. Enclosed herewith a copy of the Unaudited Standalone Financial Results along with Limited Review Report issued by KKC & Associates LLP Statutory Auditors of the Company (copy enclosed as Annexure A).

The board meeting of the directors of the Company commenced at 11:00 AM (IST) and was concluded at 12:45 PM (IST).

The above is for your information and dissemination to the public at large.

data.caption: Board Meeting Intimation for Notice Of Board Meeting Pursuant To Regulation 29 (1)(A) Of The SEBI (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulation 2015
data.news_body: Cineline India Ltdhas informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 30/07/2025 inter alia to consider and approve Pursuant to regulation 29 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulation 2015 we hereby inform you that the Meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company will be held on Wednesday 30th July 2025 inter alia where along with other matters the Board shall consider and approve the Standalone Unaudited Financial Results of the Company for the quarter ended 30th June 2025.

data.caption: Closure of Trading Window
data.news_body:
Dear Sir 
We wish to inform you that the Trading window for dealing in securities of the Company shall remain closed with effect from 01st July 2025 till 48 hours after the declaration of the unaudited financial results of the Company for the quarter ended 30th June 2025 in terms of the Code of Conduct of the Company. The date of the meeting of Board Of Directors to approve the unaudited financial results of the Company shall be intimated in due course. 
This is for your information and records

data.caption: Outcome Of Board Meeting Pursuant To Regulation 30 And 33 Of The Securities And Exchange Board Of India (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 As Amended (SEBI LODR).
data.news_body:
This is to inform regarding appointment of M/S DM Zaveri & Co Practicing Company Secretary a peer reviewed frim as secretarial auditor of the company for a term of 5 years subject to member approval and re-appointment of M/s Deloitte Touche Tohmutsu India LLP as internal Auditor for Financial year 
2025-26.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting Pursuant To Regulation 30 And 33 Of The Securities And Exchange Board Of India (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 As Amended (SEBI LODR).
data.news_body:
This is to inform you that the Board of the Directors (Board) of Cineline India Limited (Company) at their meeting held today viz. Monday May 12 2025 inter alia considered and approved the following:

The Audited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results of the company for the quarter and year ended 31st March 2025 as recommended by the Audit Committee of the Board of Director of the Company. Enclosed herewith a copy of the Audited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results along with Audit Report issued by KKC & Associates LLP Statutory Auditors of the Company and Declaration by Chairman regarding Unmodified Opinion on Auditors Report under Regulation 33(3)(d) of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 on financial results for the year ended 31st March 2025- Annexure 1.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting Pursuant To Regulation 30 And 33 Of The Securities And Exchange Board Of India (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 As Amended (SEBI LODR).
data.news_body:
This is to inform you that the Board of the Directors (Board) of Cineline India Limited (Company) at their meeting held today viz. Monday May 12 2025 inter alia considered and approved the following:

The Audited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results of the company for the quarter and year ended 31st March 2025 as recommended by the Audit Committee of the Board of Director of the Company. Enclosed herewith a copy of the Audited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results along with Audit Report issued by KKC & Associates LLP Statutory Auditors of the Company and Declaration by Chairman regarding Unmodified Opinion on Auditors Report under Regulation 33(3)(d) of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 on financial results for the year ended 31st March 2025- Annexure 1.

data.descriptor: Format of the Initial Disclosure to be made by an entity identified as a Large Corporate : Annexure
data.caption: Format of the Initial Disclosure to be made by an entity identified as a Large Corporate : Annexure A
data.news_body:
Format of Initial Disclosure to be made by an entity identified as a Large Corporate.

Sr. No. Particulars Details
1Name of CompanyCineline India Ltd
2CIN NO.L92142MH2002PLC135964
3 Outstanding borrowing of company as on 31st March / 31st December as applicable (in Rs cr) 0.00
4Highest Credit Rating during the previous FY NA
4aName of the Credit Rating Agency issuing the Credit Rating mentioned in (4)Not Applicable
5Name of Stock Exchange# in which the fine shall be paid in case of shortfall in the required borrowing under the frameworkBSE


We confirm that we are a Large Corporate as per the applicability criteria given under the SEBI circular SEBI/HO/DDHS/CIR/P/2018/144 dated November 26 2018. No



Name of the Company Secretary: DHWANI vORA
Designation: COMPANY SECRETARY AND COMPLIANCE OFFICER
EmailId: investor@cineline.co.in
Name of the Chief Financial Officer: VIPUL PAREKH
Designation: CHIEF FINANCIAL OFFICER
EmailId: vipul.parekh@cineline.co.in

Date: 29/04/2025

Note: In terms para of 3.2(ii) of the circular beginning F.Y 2022 in the event of shortfall in the mandatory borrowing through debt securities a fine of 0.2% of the shortfall shall be levied by Stock Exchanges at the end of the two-year block period. Therefore an entity identified as LC shall provide in its initial disclosure for a financial year the name of Stock Exchange to which it would pay the fine in case of shortfall in the mandatory borrowing through debt markets.

The Postal Ballot is enclosed herewith.

data.caption: Financial Results For 31St March 2023.
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 30 and 33 of the SEBI (Listing Obligation & Disclosure Requirements) Regulation, 2015, we wish to inform you that the Board of Director of Cineline India Limited, at its meeting held on 30th May, 2023, inter alia has considered and approved the following:

1. The Audited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results of the company for the fourth quarter and financial year ended 31st March, 2023 as recommended by the Audit Committee of the Board of Director of the Company.

2. The Auditors Report on Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results of the company for the fourth quarter and financial year ended 31st March, 2023.

3. Declaration on Auditor's Report with Unmodified Opinion under Regulation 33(3)(d) of SEBI(Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 on financial results for the year ended 31st March, 2023.

data.caption: Submission Of Audited Financial Results For The Quarter And Year Ended 31St March,2022
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 30 and 33 of the SEBI (Listing Obligation & Disclosure Requirements) Regulation, 2015, we wish to inform you that the Board of Director of Cineline India Limited, at its meeting held on 27th May, 2022, inter alia has considered and approved the following:

1. The Audited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results of the company for the fourth quarter and financial year ended 31st March, 2022 as recommended by the Audit Committee of the Board of Director of the Company. (Annexed as Annexure A).

2. The Auditors Report on Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results of the company for the fourth quarter and financial year ended 31st March, 2022 (Annexed as Annexure B & C respectively).

3. Declaration on Auditor's Report with Unmodified Opinion under Regulation 33(3)(d) of SEBI(Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 on financial results for the year ended 31st March, 2022 (Annexed as Annexure D).

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Submission Of Audited Financial Results For The Quarter And Year Ended 31St March, 2022.
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 30 and 33 of the SEBI (Listing Obligation & Disclosure Requirements) Regulation, 2015, we wish to inform you that the Board of Director of Cineline India Limited, at its meeting held on 27th May, 2022, inter alia has considered and approved the following:

1. The Audited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results of the company for the fourth quarter and financial year ended 31st March, 2022 as recommended by the Audit Committee of the Board of Director of the Company. (Annexed as Annexure A).

2. The Auditors Report on Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results of the company for the fourth quarter and financial year ended 31st March, 2022 (Annexed as Annexure B & C respectively).

3. Declaration on Auditor's Report with Unmodified Opinion under Regulation 33(3)(d) of SEBI(Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 on financial results for the year ended 31st March, 2022 (Annexed as Annexure D).

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 30 & 33 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations & Disclosure Requirement) Regulation, 2015, we wish to inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company has approved the following:
1.Standalone and consolidated un-audited financial results together with the Limited Review Report of the Statutory Auditors thereon for the quarter and nine months ended 31st December, 2021.

Brief particulars of the various other approved matters are enclosed in the attachment.

data.caption: Audited Financial Results For The Quarter And Year Ended 31St March,2021
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 30 and 33 of the SEBI (Listing Obligation & Disclosure Requirements) Regulation, 2015, we wish to inform you that the Board of Director of Cineline India Limited, at its meeting held on 10th June, 2021, inter alia has considered and approved the following:

1. The Audited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results of the company for the fourth quarter and financial year ended 31st March, 2021 as recommended by the Audit Committee of the Board of Director of the Company. (Annexed as Annexure A).

2. The Auditors Report on Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results of the company for the fourth quarter and financial year ended 31st March, 2021 (Annexed as Annexure B & C respectively).

3. Declaration on Auditor's Report with Unmodified Opinion under Regulation 33(3)(d) of SEBI(Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 on financial results for the year ended 31st March, 2021 (Annexed as Annexure D).

data.caption: Audited Financial Results For The Quarter And Year Ended 31St March,2021
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 30 and 33 of the SEBI (Listing Obligation & Disclosure Requirements) Regulation, 2015, we wish to inform you that the Board of Director of Cineline India Limited, at its meeting held on 10th June, 2021, inter alia has considered and approved the following:

1. The Audited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results of the company for the fourth quarter and financial year ended 31st March, 2021 as recommended by the Audit Committee of the Board of Director of the Company. (Annexed as Annexure A).

2. The Auditors Report on Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results of the company for the fourth quarter and financial year ended 31st March, 2021 (Annexed as Annexure B & C respectively).

3. Declaration on Auditor's Report with Unmodified Opinion under Regulation 33(3)(d) of SEBI(Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 on financial results for the year ended 31st March, 2021 (Annexed as Annexure D).
